titles.title: Congratulating the University of Delaware men's football team for winning the National Collegiate Athletic Association I-AA national championship.

bill.summary: Congratulates the University of Delaware Blue Hens for winning the 2003 National Collegiate Athletic Association Division I-AA football national championship.
